name: beta106i - Quantum Variants (Mystery)
milkdrop_raw:
[preset00]
fRating=5.000000
fGammaAdj=1.000000
fDecay=0.980000
fVideoEchoZoom=1.000000
fVideoEchoAlpha=0.000000
nVideoEchoOrientation=3
nWaveMode=6
bAdditiveWaves=0
bWaveDots=0
bWaveThick=0
bModWaveAlphaByVolume=0
bMaximizeWaveColor=1
bTexWrap=1
bDarkenCenter=0
bRedBlueStereo=0
bBrighten=0
bDarken=0
bSolarize=0
bInvert=0
fWaveAlpha=100.000000
fWaveScale=0.059958
fWaveSmoothing=0.000000
fWaveParam=1.000000
fModWaveAlphaStart=0.500000
fModWaveAlphaEnd=1.000000
fWarpAnimSpeed=1.000000
fWarpScale=1.000000
fZoomExponent=1.000000
fShader=0.000000
zoom=1.000000
rot=0.000000
cx=0.500000
cy=0.500000
dx=0.000010
dy=0.000010
warp=0.010000
sx=1.000000
sy=1.000000
wave_r=0.500000
wave_g=0.500000
wave_b=0.500000
wave_x=0.500000
wave_y=0.500000
ob_size=0.000000
ob_r=0.000000
ob_g=0.000000
ob_b=0.000000
ob_a=1.000000
ib_size=0.000000
ib_r=0.000000
ib_g=0.000000
ib_b=0.000000
ib_a=0.000000
nMotionVectorsX=0.000000
nMotionVectorsY=0.000000
mv_dx=0.000000
mv_dy=0.000000
mv_l=1.000000
mv_r=1.000000
mv_g=1.000000
mv_b=1.000000
mv_a=0.000000
per_frame_1=warp = 0;
per_frame_2=wave_r = wave_r + 0.25*cos(1.12*time) +
per_frame_3=0.2*(0.3*cos(1.28*time)+0.317*sin(1.8*time));
per_frame_4=wave_g = wave_g + 0.25*cos(1.142*time) +
per_frame_5=0.2*(0.3*cos(1.2*time)+0.32*sin(1.623*time));
per_frame_6=wave_b = wave_b + 0.25*cos(1.13*time) +
per_frame_7=0.2*(0.4*cos(0.9*time)+0.328*sin(1.5245*time));
per_frame_8=
per_frame_9=wave_mystery = wave_mystery + 0.1*time;
per_frame_10=
per_frame_11=wave_y = wave_y + 0.015*sin(0.1*time);
per_frame_12=wave_x = wave_x + 0.015*cos(0.1*time);
per_frame_13=
per_frame_14=wave_r = if(above(bass_att,0.95),-wave_g,wave_r);
per_frame_15=wave_b = if(above(treb_att,0.95),-wave_r,wave_b);
per_frame_16=wave_g = if(above(mid_att,0.95),-wave_b, wave_g);
per_frame_17=wave_mystery = if(above(bass_att,0.95),wave_mystery+0.45*time,wave_mystery);
per_frame_18=wave_mystery = if(above(treb_att,0.95),wave_mystery+0.32*time,wave_mystery);
per_frame_19=wave_mysteyr = if(above(mid_att,0.95),wave_mystery-0.4*time,wave_mystery);
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=
per_pixel_6=zoom = zoom + 0.05*pow(1.1*bass_att,1.2*treb_att);
per_pixel_7=rot = rot + 0.2*dx_r*cos(rad*0.5*time);
per_pixel_8=rot = rot + 0.2*dy_r*sin(rad*0.5*time);
